section.title: Identify the characteristics of an effective leader.

list.point: Encourage participation, creatvie thinking, and initiative

section.title: Identify ways to exhibit personal accountability
section.subsection: Ways to exhibit personal accountability include:

list.point: Taking ownership of incidents or requests
Knowning your responsiblities and fulfilling them
Adhering to organization policies and procedures
Representing the organization positively outside the regular work environment

section.title: Identify sucess factors to best manage your work life
section.subsection: Sucess factors to manage your work life include

list.point: Meet commitments with every assignment or meeting
Approach your manager with solutions, not problems
Be open minded--you may not understand why a speific managerial decision is made
Practice your creative and critical thinking skills
Acknowledge those around you for their positive contributions
Identify ways to assist your team and build trust

section.title: Define ethics in business
section.subsection: Ethics in business refers to abiding by principles and codes that guides how members of an organization are expected to behave.  Ethics include integrity, which is the honesty of one's action, and aligning one's value with the values of the organization.
